description:
Albert is kidnapped! Franz`s frantic attempt to collect the ransom money comes up short, so he warily seeks the assistance of the Count of Monte Cristo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jusqu`à ce que le soleil se lève sur la Lune
Prima che sorga il sole sulla luna
Tsuki ni Asahi ga Noboru made
Until the Sun Rises over the Moon
